chunk_size.descr: Chunk size (bytes) that is used to build B+-tree at each level. This is a local config to each ForestDB database instance.

buffer_cache_size.descr: Buffer cache size in bytes (128MB by default). If the size is set to zero, then the buffer cache is disabled. This is a global config that is used across all ForestDB database instances.

wal_threshold.descr: WAL index size threshold in memory (4096 entries by default). This is a local config to each ForestDB database instance.

enable_seq_btree.descr: Enable or disable a sequence B+-Tree. This is a local config to each ForestDB database instance.

durability_option.descr: Durability options supported in ForestDB. This is a local config to each ForestDB database instance.

compaction_buf_size.descr: Maximum size (bytes) of temporary buffer for compaction (16MB by default). This is a local config to each ForestDB database instance.
